Text: th Floor Meeting FeedbackJeff Thanks for speaking last Wednesday on it was my first floor meeting with you and I found it informative I like your informal no bones about it style a style I wish more people would adopt During the meeting you had made some references about your previous guest which concerned me As an employee and shareholder in Enron it occurred to me that some of the comments would not benefit Enron if they were ever leaked out to the press ie like the Houston Chronicle article on the PRC process I do have one question to ask with your light hearted comment about Air India In order to achieve the vision of being the Worlds Leading Company do you anticipate we will further develop business activities within existing areas or do you anticipate Enron becoming involved in entirely new business areas In other words do you see us building new businesses which represent a natural evolution of our current activities or do you anticipate something more radical A couple of months ago you said in an interview that you will continue running the company in a business as usual fashion will that change Thanks for taking the time to speak with us Avril x
